segments.text: Something awful happened . We went to the Portobello Road , and someone stole my handbag .
segments.speaker: S2

segments.text: Oh , dear . Did you lose a lot of money ?
segments.speaker: S1

segments.text: No . Only a few pounds . But my passport was in the bag . That ’ what I ’ m really worried about .
segments.speaker: S2

segments.text: You must tell your embassy about it . And I think they ’ ll issue you with a new one .
segments.speaker: S1
